_sText:
I always enjoyed the original aim_ak_colt, but felt that the map was too bland and didn't do the engine any justice. As a side project I started building this trainstation version of ak_colt, and I hope that members of the community will play it and enjoy it's slight variations on the original.

If people are interested, I will continue and update this map. But as for now I feel finished enough to let it be.
